original_text: But whoever lives by the truth comes into the light, so that it may be seen plainly that what they have done has been done in the sight of God.
korean_text: 진리를 따르는 자는 빛으로 오나니 이는 그 행위가 하나님 안에서 행한 것임을 나타내려 함이라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: But whoever lives by the truth
so that it may be seen plainly
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇게 함은 명백히 보이게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: has been done in the sight of God
